title: What should be the sequence of maths chapters for classes 11th and 12th for JEE? - Quora

response.answer_text: The sequence of the maths chapters for JEE are Matrices and determinants because this chapter is easy and also a scoring chapter so you need to try to cover maximum number of questionsCoordinate geometry is also the same case it is formulae based and scoring.Get perfection in the topics which are given exclusively for mains.Calculus( mainly definite integrals,”differential equations “) which should be given extra emphasis while practicingVectors and 3D geometryTrigonometry it may be last topic in sequence but questions will not be asked directly they may be application based questions which needs to be applied in various topics like integrals etc .I hope this is useful all the best for your preparation and exam.
